text: Sof√≠a Lauren Daccarett Char (born April 10, 1993), known professionally as Sofia Carson, is an American actress and singer. Her first appearance on television was as a guest star on the Disney Channel series Austin & Ally. In 2015, she appeared as Evie, the daughter of the Evil Queen, in the Disney Channel Original Movie Descendants, and later returned to this role in Descendants 2 and Descendants 3. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American pop singers Category:American dancers Category:Singers from Florida Category:Actors from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:Musicians from Fort Lauderdale, Florida
title: Sofia Carson
